name: Ebb and Flow
description:
Gameplay by Unhooman. Music produced by Dmytro Nebesh.

You are the unfortunate victim of a plane crash in the middle of the ocean, along with a stranger that has caught your eye. Or perhaps you can't stand them.

At the end of the day, it's your choice.

  • Use your tinkering skills to craft different items on the island you have washed up on. 
    • Crafting is a one way transaction!
  • Pick gifts to give to your island-mate to alter their opinion about you.
    • Choose wisely, as gifts cannot be taken back!
  • You have 5 in-game days to discover recipes and create your artillery of gifts.
    • Just use the mouse to drag and drop items!
  • Use the ">>" button to skip to your rescue.
    • Try to get all the endings!
